Package com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.drawables

This package contains basic Drawables that lay out the entire appearence of certain widgets.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ButtonDrawable Background Drawable for buttons that includes a border with a solid color.
CheckBoxDrawable Using the same paradigm as CircleDrawable, CheckBoxDrawable is a solid color filled square with two lines to form the appearence of a check mark.
CircleDrawable Background Drawable that is a solid circle with a concentric center circle.
SeekBarDrawable Allow seek bar to update automatically to the current theme color.
ToggleDrawable Drawable used in WPToggleSwitch.
WPDrawables Used to externalize the generation of Drawables.
 

Package com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.drawables Description

This package contains basic Drawables that lay out the entire appearence of certain widgets. Along with the WPDrawables class in the root package, they represent simple shapes that come together to form user interface elements.

The developer of this library may be contacted at contact@tombarrasso.com.
